spec_data.Name: perl-Config-Any
spec_data.Description:
Config::Any provides a facility for Perl applications and libraries to
load configuration data from multiple different file formats. It supports
XML, YAML, JSON, Apache-style configuration, Windows INI files, and even
Perl code.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:20:35 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Load configuration from different file formats, transparently
